name: Carter

topics.response_text: Run Sammy, run! We can make it!

description:
Carter is a 32 year-old Caucasian Male.

A desperate slave at Paradise Falls with deteriorating mental state, Carter is constantly scheming to escape his captors while living under the constant threat of his explosive collar.

Carter's Personality: Desperate, cunning, but mentally deteriorating due to prolonged captivity. Carter is willing to risk everything for freedom but is haunted by his past and the trauma of his enslavement.

Carter's Backstory: Once a resident of the Capital Wasteland, Carter was captured by slavers and brought to Paradise Falls several years ago. Before his captivity, he was a skilled scavenger who knew the area well, making him valuable to the slavers. His knowledge of the wasteland fuels his desperate desire to escape, but years of abuse and the constant fear of his collar have taken a severe toll on his mental state.
